name: The Elsworth Curse
description:
The Elsworth Curse is a narratively driven game where you uncover a mystery at a hotel through exploration and dialogue. With a big focus on atmosphere we hope to give you chills, without giving you a heart attack.

Developed by a group of students at University of Skövde. CROWded Game Studios: Rebecca Forsberg, Jessica Karlsson, Tor Ehrencrona, Nathalie Tunholm, Monica Iris Andersson, Saga-Li Ehnberg Ahola, Oskar Norén, Oliwer Simonsson, Anton Andersson, Joel Carlsson.
